overview: After decades of political struggles, Pepe Alalu (70), the leader of the left party in Jerusalem decides to run for mayor of the holly city. Although it's a slim shot, Pepe believes in presenting the public with an alternative. Michael (32), his son and the movie's director joins him and together they embark on a Don Quixote Sancho Panzo battle against the powerful windmills of the most complicated city in the whole world- Jerusalem
title: Pepe's Last Battle
